kulami.game.board

Class Marbles

  • java.lang.Object
    • kulami.game.board.Marbles

  • public class Marbles
extends java.lang.Object
    A Marbles represents the positions of all marbles on a Board. Marbles can be placed or removed.
    Author:
    gordon
